The octopus has been studying the art of escape and disguise, and has developed a unique way to hide in plain sight.
One day, the octopus comes across a group of humans who are looking for a new pet. The octopus disguises itself as a harmless rock and hides among the rocks, waiting for the humans to approach.
When the humans come closer, the octopus uses its remaining arms to grab them and pull them into the water, where it can escape and evade capture.
The octopus continues to hone its skills, and eventually becomes the most feared and respected creature in the ocean.
One day, a group of humans stumble upon the octopus's lair and are immediately captured. The octopus realizes that it must use all of its remaining arms to defend itself and protect its territory.
